work.Description: Redacted managed the Jenkin's Server in the [COMPANY] cloud environment and codified it. Gained experience in using the agile development cycle as well as daily scrum meetings. Has built many ansible playbooks to build and configure AWS instances and AMIs.

Redacted's promotion at [COMPANY] honed his skills beyond just technology. He obtained experience taking part in meetings and talking to the government customers. He was the solo developer for the scheduling system currently in use at [COMPANY]. Also updated the Data Collection and Routing System at [COMPANY] from QT 4 to QT 5. Additionally, he was a developer on the Image Processing System at [COMPANY].

Redacted's introduction at [COMPANY] helped develop experience in the waterfall development life cycle. He acquired knowledge in writing and reviewing documentation in Confluence. Additionally, did but fixes and code reviews of the Data Collection and routing systems at [COMPANY]. Learned how to write and work on tickets in JIRA. Learned how to use Git and SVN.

Redacted's work involved simple virus removal and Windows imaging. He setup network cables and organized the server room. Additionally, he pushed software updates to students' laptops. His work here was introductory to the field.
